Twisted-11.0.0.tar.bz2:
twisted directory copied into bigworld/res/scripts/server_common

Zope-2.11.4-final.tgz:
lib/python/zope/interface copied into bigworld/res/scripts/server_common

Pympler-0.3.0.tar.gz:
pympler directory copied to bigworld/res/scripts/common/Lib
Applied patch pympler-0.3.0-bwchanges.diff

oursql-0.9.3.1.zip:
oursql compiled and then copied to bigworld/res/server_common/lib-dynload64

SQLAlchemy-0.6.6.tar.gz:
Object Relational Mapper copied to bigworld/res/scripts/server_common/sqlalchemy
